name: Floaty Hamster: Hard Endless Platformer Game FREE
name_original: Floaty Hamster: Hard Endless Platformer Game FREE
description:
Get your swimsuits ready, this summer's smash hit is here! It consists of one hamster, one river and infinite deadly beaver-constructed objects that are trying to end your score streak. Pretty simple. So hop on the Floaty train and get rid of that flappy bird fellow.

Key features:

- innovative flicking control
- beautiful hand drawn graphics
- awesome double physics (water and gravity)
- challenging gameplay
- simple to learn, hard to master
- online highscores
- unlockable characters (with score points or IAPs)
- unlockable story (with score points or IAPs)

Floaty Hamster is a simple game with a simple protagonist who just wants to live! Swim with Floaty, help him jump over obstacles and dive under them, conquer the jungle!

We made sure you don't just spin your wheels like some hamster (haha, get it) for no reason. Those with the highest skill, determination and score will get to marvel at our beautiful secret extra characters. You can also uncover the mystery behind the beaver civilization that's trying to shorten your water floating fun times.

But wait, there's more! If you're feeling proud of your score, make sure you click „Submit Online“ and see where you stand on the highscore leaderboard. After you see you're in the bottom 10% of the world, but still two points better than your friend, make sure you screenshot it, print it and put it in your friends mailbox, windscreen and/or locker!
